DivrsEquityInclSum.name: DivrsEquityInclSum
DivrsEquityInclSum.description: Represents information that indicates the quantitative view of the organization based on the employee gender, age group, and other fairness indicators.

AgeGroup.description: Specifies the age group of an employee.

Description.description: The description of the employee statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the employee statistics are generated.

EmployeePercentage.description: The percentage of employees according to the unique combination of category and type based on gender, age group, race and location.

EmployeeType.description: Specifies the type of employee that is a part of the fairness statistic.

EmploymentType.description: Specifies the type of employment that's included in the fairness statistic.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of an employee.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Location.description: Specifies the location of an employee.

ManagementLevel.description: Specifies the management level of the employee.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Race.description: Specifies the race of an employee.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.
